00034 #include "trex/europa/DeliberationFilter.hh"
00035 #include "trex/europa/Assembly.hh"
00036 #include "trex/europa/bits/europa_helpers.hh"

00038 #include <PLASMA/TokenVariable.hh>

00040 using namespace TREX::europa;

00042 /*
00043  * class TREX::europa::TokenFilter
00044  */
00045 // structors
00046 
00047 TokenFilter::TokenFilter(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg)
00048   :EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawFilter(cfg, true), m_assembly(NULL) {}
00049 
00050 // observers
00051 
00052 Assembly const &TokenFilter::assembly() const {
00053   if( !have_assembly() )
00054     throw EuropaException("TokenFilter not attached to a TREX assembly.");
00055   return *m_assembly;
00056 }
00057 
00058 // modifiers
00059 
00060 void TokenFilter::set_assembly(EUROPA::EngineComponentId const &component) {
00061   if( !have_assembly() && component.isId() ) 
00062     m_assembly = &(details::assembly_of(component));
00063 }
00064 
00065 // manipulators
00066 
00067 bool TokenFilter::tokenCheck(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00068   return assembly().ignored(token) ||
00069     token->start()->lastDomain().getLowerBound() >= assembly().final_tick() ||
00070     token->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound() <= assembly().initial_tick();
00071 }
00072 
00073 bool TokenFilter::test(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) {
00074   EUROPA::TokenId token;
00075 
00076   if( EUROPA::TokenId::convertable(entity)  ) {
00077     token = EUROPA::TokenId(entity);
00078     set_assembly(token->getPlanDatabase());
00079   } else if( EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId::convertable(entity) ) {
00080     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId var(entity);
00081     set_assembly(var->getConstraintEngine());
00082 
00083     token = details::parent_token(var);
00084   }    
00085   
00086   return token.isNoId() || tokenCheck(token) || doTest(token);
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*
00090  * class TREX::europa::DeliberationScope
00091  */
00092 
00093 bool DeliberationScope::doTest(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00094   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &t_start(tok->start()->lastDomain());
00095   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &t_end(tok->start()->lastDomain());
00096   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain horizon = assembly().plan_scope();
00097 
00098   return t_start.getLowerBound() >= horizon.getUpperBound() ||
00099     t_end.getUpperBound() < horizon.getLowerBound();
00100 }
00101 
00102 /*
00103  * class TREX::europa::SynchronizationScope
00104  */
00105 
00106 bool SynchronizationScope::doTest(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00107   EUROPA::eint cur = assembly().now();
00108   // debugMsg("trex:filt:synch", "Checking if "<<tok->toString()<<" overlaps "<<cur);
00109   
00110   if( tok->start()->lastDomain().getLowerBound() > cur ) {
00111     debugMsg("trex:filt:synch", tok->toString()<<".start="<<tok->start()->lastDomain().toString()
00112              <<" after "<<cur<<" => EXCLUDE"); 
00113     return true;
00114   }
00115   if( tok->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound() < cur ) {
00116     debugMsg("trex:filt:synch", tok->toString()<<".end="<<tok->end()->lastDomain().toString()
00117              <<" before "<<cur<<" => EXCLUDE"); 
00118     return true;
00119   }
00120 //  debugMsg("trex:filt:synch", tok->toString()<<" overlaps "<<cur<<" => OK");
00121   return false;
00122 }
